LapDilite

Web Application

About This Project

Developed a web application named LapDilite using Core PHP, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The project included various approval stages, document uploads, and a maker-checker process for loan creation and disbursement. Emphasized security and VAPT (Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing) concerns while ensuring a user-friendly interface.

Technologies Used

  • Core PHP
  • JavaScript
  • HTML
  • CSS
